patterns: department of computer science and engineering

patterns: tall me about triple e department
responses: The Department of Electric & Electronic Engineering is the 2nd large department of BAIUST, located in campus 1.

patterns: tall me about civil engineering department
responses: The Department of Civil Engineering offers the very best civil engineering education, located in campus 2.

patterns: tall me about business administration department
responses: The Department of Business Administration is one of the pioneering departments at BAIUST, locates in campus 2.
The department of english is designed to provide students with a milieu in literature, skills required for effective communication, locates in campus 2.
The department of law is the newest department of BAIUST, locates in campus 2.

patterns: how many department are in baiust
responses: There are 6 departments in BAIUST. Department of Computer Science & Engineering, Department of Electric & Electronic Engineering, Department of Civil Engineering, Department of Business Administration, Department of English, Department of law

patterns: where is the permanent campus of baiust
responses: The permanent campus is located in Kalakachua near Dhaka-Chittagong Highway, which is under construction.
